name: Niwashi Kid - Super 8 bit run and fun

description:
Game is also available at iTunes Appstore:

 https://apps.apple.com/tr/app/8-bit-kid-run-and-jump/id1474698854

Altough gameplay video has on screen controls because the gameplay was recorded in mobile phone, the PC version doesn't have the controls visible. Thank you for your understanding.

8 Bit Kid is an old school 8bit platformer game with many surprises on the way!

Long story short: Your brother is kidnapped so go and rescue him! No big deal!

Game Features

-8 bit old school gaming

-Total of 50short  challenging levels

-Fun and surprising puzzles to solve

-Relaxing platform game music to play to

-8 bit stye pixel art

Game Controls

Left and Right Keys  to move around.

Up Key  is for Jumping up

Space Key is for throwing knives

During Gameplay hit "Q" to return to main menu.

"M" to turn  music on and off

"S" to turn sound effects on and off
